mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, INCOME_TIME, INCOME_TYPE, INCOME_COMMENT, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_TIME, PROCESS_COMMENT, CREATE_ID, PROCESS_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_tel_income_log (ID, APP_ID, INCOME_TIME, INCOME_TYPE, INCOME_COMMENT, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_TIME, PROCESS_COMMENT, CREATE_ID, PROCESS_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_tel_income_log
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_TIME = #{incomeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INCOME_TYPE = #{incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_COMMENT = #{incomeComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_TIME = #{processTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROCESS_COMMENT = #{processComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_ID = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_tel_income_log set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_TIME = #{incomeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INCOME_TYPE = #{incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_COMMENT = #{incomeComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_TIME = #{processTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESS_COMMENT = #{processComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_ID = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ID as id, a.APP_ID as appId, a.INCOME_TIME as incomeTime, a.INCOME_TYPE as incomeType, b1.DICT_DATA_NAME as incomeTypeDesc, a.INCOME_COMMENT as incomeComment, a.PROCESS_STATUS as processStatus, b2.DICT_DATA_NAME as processStatusDesc, a.PROCESS_TIME as processTime, a.PROCESS_COMMENT as processComment, a.CREATE_ID as createId, c1.ACCOUNT_NAME as createName, a.PROCESS_ID as processId, c2.ACCOUNT_NAME as processName from t_tel_income_log a left join SYS_DICT_DATA b1 on a.INCOME_TYPE = b1.dict_data_code left join SYS_DICT_DATA b2 on a.PROCESS_STATUS = b2.dict_data_code left join SYS_ACCOUNT c1 on a.CREATE_ID = c1.ACCOUNT_ID left join SYS_ACCOUNT c2 on a.PROCESS_ID = c2.ACCOUNT_ID where a.APP_ID = #{appId} order by a.INCOME_TIME
